issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Seen in QA during 3.1 GA runs. Occasionally a VMware instance fails to launch due to imager failure with the following signature:

{code}
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:56 2012][020135][EUCAINFO  ] {732969888} ch(own|mod) '/disk1/storage/eucalyptus/instances/vmware/cache/dsk-306834E7-84b8aad4' *.* 771
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:56 2012][020135][EUCADEBUG ] {732969888} attaching file /disk1/storage/eucalyptus/instances/vmware/cache/dsk-306834E7-84b8aad4/blocks
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:56 2012][020135][EUCADEBUG ] {732969888}             to /dev/loop50 at offset 0
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:56 2012][020135][EUCADEBUG ] [emi-306834E7-69F52C36-80616D2A] created a blob for an artifact 008|dsk-306834E7-84b8aad4 on try 1
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:56 2012][020135][EUCAINFO  ] [emi-306834E7-69F52C36-80616D2A] constructing disk of size 2147515904 bytes in dsk-306834E7-84b8aad4 (/dev/loop50)
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:56 2012][020135][EUCADEBUG ] [emi-306834E7-69F52C36-80616D2A] mapping partition 1 from /dev/mapper/euca-emi-306834E7-6f162905 [63-2097214]
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:56 2012][020135][EUCADEBUG ] [emi-306834E7-69F52C36-80616D2A] mapping partition 2 from /dev/loop2 [2097215-3145790]
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:56 2012][020135][EUCADEBUG ] [emi-306834E7-69F52C36-80616D2A] mapping partition 3 from /dev/loop3 [3145791-4194366]
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:56 2012][020135][EUCAINFO  ] {732969888} ch(own|mod) '/dev/mapper/euca-dsk-306834E7-84b8aad4-p0-back' eucalyptus.* 660
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:56 2012][020135][EUCAINFO  ] {732969888} ch(own|mod) '/dev/mapper/euca-dsk-306834E7-84b8aad4-p0-snap' eucalyptus.* 660
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:56 2012][020135][EUCAINFO  ] {732969888} ch(own|mod) '/dev/mapper/euca-dsk-306834E7-84b8aad4' eucalyptus.* 660
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:56 2012][020135][EUCAINFO  ] [emi-306834E7-69F52C36-80616D2A] creating MBR
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:56 2012][020135][EUCAINFO  ] [emi-306834E7-69F52C36-80616D2A] adding partition 1 to partition table (/dev/mapper/euca-dsk-306834E7-84b8aad4)
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:57 2012][020135][EUCAINFO  ] [emi-306834E7-69F52C36-80616D2A] adding partition 2 to partition table (/dev/mapper/euca-dsk-306834E7-84b8aad4)
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:57 2012][020135][EUCAINFO  ] [emi-306834E7-69F52C36-80616D2A] adding partition 3 to partition table (/dev/mapper/euca-dsk-306834E7-84b8aad4)
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:57 2012][020135][EUCAERROR ] {732969888} error: bad return code from cmd 'LD_PRELOAD='' //usr/lib/eucalyptus/euca_rootwrap /sbin/parted --script /dev/mapper/euca-dsk-306834E7-84b8aad4 mkpart primary  3145791s 4194366s 2>&1'
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:57 2012][020135][EUCADEBUG ] device-mapper: remove ioctl failed: Device or resource busy
device-mapper: create ioctl failed: Device or resource busy
device-mapper: remove ioctl failed: Device or resource busy
Warning: The resulting partition is not properly aligned for best performance.
Warning: parted was unable to re-read the partition table on /dev/mapper/euca-dsk-306834E7-84b8aad4 (Device or resource busy).  This means Linux won't know anything about the modifications you made. 

[Wed Jun 20 06:55:57 2012][020135][EUCAINFO  ] ERROR: cannot add a partition
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:57 2012][020135][EUCAERROR ] [emi-306834E7-69F52C36-80616D2A] error: failed to add partition 3 to disk: 2 blobstore.c:1259 no such entity
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:57 2012][020135][EUCAERROR ] [emi-306834E7-69F52C36-80616D2A] error: failed to create artifact dsk-306834E7-84b8aad4 (error=1, may retry) on try 1
device-mapper: remove ioctl failed: Device or resource busy
Command failed
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:57 2012][020135][EUCADEBUG ] {732969888} detaching from loop device /dev/loop50
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:57 2012][020135][EUCADEBUG ] {732969888} detaching from loop device /dev/loop47
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:57 2012][020135][EUCADEBUG ] {732969888} detaching from loop device /dev/loop49
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:58 2012][020135][EUCADEBUG ] [emi-306834E7-69F52C36-80616D2A] error: failed to implement artifact 008|dsk-306834E7-84b8aad4 on try 1
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:58 2012][020135][EUCAERROR ] [convert] error: failed to provision dependency dsk-306834E7-84b8aad4 for artifact dsk-306834E7-84b8aad4.vmdk (error=1) on try 1
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:58 2012][020135][EUCADEBUG ] [convert] error: failed to implement artifact 009|dsk-306834E7-84b8aad4.vmdk on try 1
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:58 2012][020135][EUCAERROR ] [upload] error: failed to provision dependency dsk-306834E7-84b8aad4.vmdk for artifact https://192.168.51.49 (error=1) on try 1
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:58 2012][020135][EUCADEBUG ] [upload] error: failed to implement artifact 010|https://192.168.51.49 on try 1
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:58 2012][020135][EUCAINFO  ] cleaning up for 'prepare'...
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:58 2012][020135][EUCAINFO  ] cleaning up for 'convert'...
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:58 2012][020135][EUCAINFO  ] cleaning up for 'upload'...
[Wed Jun 20 06:55:58 2012][020135][EUCAINFO  ] imager done (exit code=1)
{code}

(this is from http://10.1.1.210/test_space/GA-vmware-multinet-esxi-50/1011/bfebs_test_No_002/artifacts/logs/192.168.51.19_CLC/euca_imager.log )

No cause is known at the moment.
fields.summary: /sbin/parted invocation by euca_imager fails, apparently nondeterministically
